entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
